title: Architect / Engineer / Town Planner / Supervisor referred to in Regulation No
clause_text: Architect / Engineer / Town Planner / Supervisor referred to in Regulation No.2.2.16 shall be registered / licensed by the Authority as competent to plan and carry out various works as given
section: Qualification and Competence of the Architect / Licensed Engineer / Structural Engineer / Town Planner / Supervisor

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
